references.paper_title: Phi-3 technical report: A highly capable language model locally on your phone
references.reason: This technical report introduces Phi-3, which is used in the main paper as a non-reasoning model.

references.paper_title: L1: Controlling how long a reasoning model thinks with reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper on reinforcement learning directly influences this work, as its used for controlling overthinking.

references.paper_title: Large language models for mathematical reasoning: Progresses and challenges
references.reason: This paper is a student research paper that gives background and talks about the progress and challenges related to mathematical reasoning in Large Language Models, which is one of the main points in the initial paper.
This paper proposes a blueprint of Reasoning Language Models, which relates to the reasoning done by the models used in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Towards reasoning era: A survey of long chain-of-thought for reasoning large language models
references.reason: This paper studies long chain-of-thought for reasoning in LLMs which are highly related to the ideas of overthinking.
